Allow admins to view all audits.name: Allow admins to view all audits
Allow admins to view all audits.using:
(EXISTS ( SELECT 1
   FROM employees
  WHERE ((employees.id = employee_monthly_activities_audit.employee_id) AND (employees.role = ANY (ARRAY['admin'::text, 'super-admin'::text])))))

Allow employees to view own audit.name: Allow employees to view own audit

Admins manage all records.name: Admins manage all records
Admins manage all records.using:
(EXISTS ( SELECT 1
    FROM employees
    WHERE ((employees.id = (auth.uid())::text) AND (employees.role = ANY (ARRAY['admin'::text, 'super-admin'::text])))))

Allow everyone to view/edit their own re.name: Allow everyone to view/edit their own records

Admins can manage all competency.name: Admins can manage all competency
Admins can manage all competency.using:
((auth.uid())::text IN ( SELECT employees.id
   FROM employees
  WHERE (employees.role = ANY (ARRAY['admin'::text, 'super-admin'::text]))))

Admins can manage history.name: Admins can manage history
Admins can manage history.using:
((auth.uid())::text IN ( SELECT employees.id
   FROM employees
  WHERE (employees.role = ANY (ARRAY['admin'::text, 'super-admin'::text]))))

Admin insert access for job structure.withCheck:
(EXISTS ( SELECT 1
   FROM employees
  WHERE ((employees.id = (auth.uid())::text) AND (employees.role = ANY (ARRAY['super-admin'::text, 'admin'::text])))))

Admins can manage activations.name: Admins can manage activations
Admins can manage activations.using:
(EXISTS ( SELECT 1
   FROM employees
  WHERE ((employees.auth_user_id = (auth.uid())::text) AND (employees.role = ANY (ARRAY['admin'::text, 'super-admin'::text])))))

Users can insert own attendance, creator.name: Users can insert own attendance, creators can insert for their

public.v_attendance_changes.definition: SELECT employee_id AS "employeeId", entity_id AS "entityId", date("timestamp") AS date, old_status AS "oldStatus", new_status AS "newStatus", change_type AS "changeType", changed_at AS "changedAt", changed_by AS "changedBy", reason, is_late_entry AS "isLateEntry", concat('Status changed from ', COALESCE(old_status, 'empty'::text), ' to ', COALESCE(new_status, 'empty'::text), CASE WHEN reason IS NOT NULL AND reason <> ''::text THEN concat(' (Reason: ', reason, ')') ELSE ''::text END) AS "changeDescription" FROM attendance_records_history h
public.v_attendance_changes.name: v_attendance_changes

public.v_daily_activity_changes.definition: SELECT employee_id, date(changed_at) AS change_date, count(*) AS total_changes, string_agg(DISTINCT change_type, ', '::text) AS change_types, min(changed_at) AS first_change, max(changed_at) AS last_change FROM employee_monthly_activities_audit GROUP BY employee_id, (date(changed_at)) ORDER BY (date(changed_at)) DESC, employee_id
public.v_daily_activity_changes.name: v_daily_activity_changes
